current_weather: %detailed_status% over %city%. It's %temperature% degree %temperature_units%. Humidity is %humidity% percent.
sunrise: Today the sun rises at %time% in %city%.
sunset: Today the sun sets set at %time% in %city%.
invalid_temperature_units: Invalid temperature unit. Check your config.json file.
settings_error: Please check your settings. An error occured because %reason%. The message is: %message%.
request_error: I could not understand your request.
connection_error: I'm having issuse reaching the server.
